metadata.synopsis: AD one liners to react to zombies coming out of the portrait when attacked. There is a has met in case players had already attacked the portrait.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Start a combat started by attacking the portrait with any weapon other than the candles of revocation.Need to call: oe LOW_OskarsBeloved_BringOskarHomeLocation: CTY_Main_A -258; 34; -43

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Ah! A little true to life for my tastes.
